item.description:
The snow won't start until Sunday, so come on out and join us!

CLICK HERE TO RSVP ON THE CTNITES.COM VIP CLUB PAGE

oin the CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club for the best Mexican food in Connecticut at La Boca Mexican Restaurant and Cantina in Middletown on Saturday, Dec 15 at 7 pm.

After dinner, we will move to La Boca's Night Club to listen to the music of Classic Rock, R & B, and Standards from 45 r.p.m.

La Boca will be giving the CTNites.com VIP Club members (that's you) a FREE appetizer and free admission after dinner to see 45 r.p.m..

Look for the CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club at La Boca wearing black "Official CTNites.com VIP Clubber" shirts, and call Robert at (860) 569-8094 with any questions. I will have this phone number forwarded to my cell phone, so call the night of the event if you have any problems.

Please RSVP on http://socialnetwork....

La Boca Mexican Restaurant and Cantina
520 Main Street
Middletown, CT 06457
Tel: (860) 347-4777
www.LaBocaOnline.com

Directions:
From Hartford (15 minutes)
I-91 South to Route 9 South (Exit 22S)
Turn Right on CT-15/St John?s Sq
Turn Left on Main Street
La Boca is on your Left

Free Parking is available anywhere on Main Street or behind La Boca, so join us for a night of great food, great music, prizes, and big fun! RSVP Today!

Visit http://www.CTNites.co... for more info, or call Robert at (860) 569-8094 with any questions.

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: CTNites.com VIP Club has invited us Dec 15 Dinner at La Boca Mexican Restaurant
